name: Untitled Cave Game (WIP)
description:
use WASD or arrow keys to move. it'll take a moment to load.

hi all! this is an untitled game that I'm actively working on to practice procedural generation, art and animations with a limited palette, and (eventually) highly dynamic lighting shaders. my vision for this game is closer to an interactive art piece than a traditional game, so the actual gameplay will take a backseat to the visuals. that said, I do want the experience to be great, so I'm open to any and all feedback. I hope you all join me as I slowly develop this little project :)

currently, the only thing to do is wander through the generated caves, since cave generation is what I'm focusing on.
